original_title: 夫不在の週末にキスまで不倫を1年続けた隣人男と朝から晩まで接吻セックスしまくった2日間
overview: Don't expect more than a kiss. She is suddenly kissed by the married woman who lives next to her, and from this day on, she is at the mercy of this married woman and falls in love with her. "It's like a relationship with only kisses has returned to youth, and it's exciting and fresh." I'm finally in a relationship that's more than a kiss... Even the kiss is erotic. A fetish affair drama that pursues kissing. The toothache that can not go ahead from the kiss exploded at once, and I repeated kissing sex until the morning for two days on the weekend.
title: While My Husband Was Away For The Weekend, I Spent Those 2 Days Having Kissing Sex With My Neighbor, With Whom I Did Everything From Kissing To Adultery Over The Course Of A Year, From Morning Until Night Nanami Misaki
